name: Cooties Attack!
description:
This is my entry for the game off 2021
Sadly on the emulator the sound is not working, but using the hex file on any arduboy (original or DIY) will work just fine :D

For phone users, you can test my game Here  it should open a new tab with a phone friendly emulator

i always loved the arduboy console, and the idea of it, so i wanted to give it a little more visibility, if you're interested on it, you can go to their page

Controls

  • Arrows to move arround
  • z or a for shoot

also, have fun finding the bug on this game!

(the emulator for the phone, as well as the embebed one are not made by me, it belongs to FManga (Felipe Manga) on arduboy forums)
